mapper.sql: from D_DL_CURV_C D, C_GP GP, C_MP MP, C_METER M, G_TG TG, O_ORG O
mapper.select: select O.ORG_NAME, TG.TG_NAME, MP.MP_NAME, M.ASSET_NO, GP.CT_TIMES, GP.PT_TIMES, GP.CT_TIMES * GP.PT_TIMES as TOTAL_TIMES, TO_CHAR(D.DATA_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DATA_TIME, D.P_ACT_TOTAL_LAST, D.P_ACT_TOTAL, D.P_ACT_DL
